page.title: 13Bideford:S+SE.Smallholding.
page.content: I live on a farm with 1 brother and 1 sister.We have a big house and a big garden and 1 field.In the summer holid- ays we walk down the lane to get the newspapers.On either side of the lane are fields and the sides have wild flow -ers growing in the hedges.Sometimes we walk across the fields when the grass is being cut and there are paths of gra -ss everywhere.After we have been for a walk we collect the eggs from the chick -ens and tidy up the house a little bit We have 5 cows and 1 of them is for mil -king and often has calves.It usually has 1 every year.When it has a calf we we are allowed to watch the vet pull it out.We first see its hind legs and they are covered in a bag of skin.The calves are born in the field in summer and in the barn in winter. Sarah Ford,Upcott. (Space prevented crediting Tracy Lock of Pillmouth Fm.with the 2 prev. pieces
